outputs.output_descr: A National PeaceArchitecute Framework developed and adopted by all sstakeholders through a process of regional and national stakeholedr consultations. This will inform, and lead to the design of, a multi-year project support document which will support the establishment of a National Peace Architecture
Media skills and mechanisms in dialogue and Conflict sensitive journalism for media houses and journalists developed and utilised
Selected Women and Youth groups have capacity to actively participate in Violence Prevention, Dialogue, Mediation and Social Cohesion
Public sector, Religious and Civil Society Leader's dialogue promotion programme for strengthening Social Cohesion developed and implemented in selected areas
Effective project management and service delivery

project_descr: The Social Cohesion and National Peace Architecture Project will support the creation of a framework for collaborative problem solving and dialogue including developing a Policy Framework.
